data.text:
@Reuters So it's back to normal... What a load of bullshit...
Scamdemic of note.
@Reuters "And just like that the covid pandemic was over."
@Reuters They also dropped any self-respect by not condemning Russian invasion. I rather visit Ukraine once the war is over to support their economy.
@Reuters We shall be having a meeting on Monday. 7:30pm. Via Twitter, come join us. https://t.co/ZSnjCtrECn

@Reuters Every day of Zelensky's presidency in Ukraine costs the lives of its citizens dying for Zelensky's right to feel great,posting on social networks stories about their conversations with the West,threatening Russia\and giving him the opportunity to kill.STOP THE GENOCIDE OF DONBASS https://t.co/oQKpg8Fw9q
@Reuters You know what they could drop: their abstention in the #UNSecurityCouncil against condemning the #Russian attack on #Ukraine!

@Reuters We've gathered together to create an
account to help aid we the Ukrainians. It
hasn't been an happy moment since the
attack and we're loosing our homes and
love ones. Please support us today! You
can with bitcoin:
bc1qdzj3n|6gv6ey78d3Ã—5a898pngrcx7krh
gvvfua https://t.co/bftZb2y2sy
